Key Match Events: Chile took the lead with Eduardo Vargas scoring in the 2nd minute, but Brazil came back to win 2-1 thanks to a late goal by Luiz Henrique in the 89th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil coach praised his team's resilience and ability to come back from behind to secure the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos in Santiago, Chile, in front of a crowd of 43,059 fans
Brazil's win moved them to 4-1-4, 13 points in the CONMEBOL World Cup qualifying standings
Chile's loss dropped them to 1-2-6, 5 points in the standings
